portfolio

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • portfolio.Portfolio

  • public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
    Portfolio class: class runs the main method and proceeds to run the GUI. The GUI then proceeds to call the necessary methods. The command loop from A2 has been disabled. Date: November 29th, 2017
